snippet: A growing number of local providers, and even some insurers, are finding ways to improve the American health care system.
abstract: Editorial highlights successful experiments conducted across the United States by hospitals, doctors, employers and health insurers aimed at finding ways to reduce the cost of delivering medical care while maintaining or improving quality; asserts that such experiments emphasize the importance of health care reform, which will give an important boost to the process of lowering costs and improving care.
lead_paragraph: A growing number of local providers, and even some insurers, are finding ways to improve the American health care system.
